acceptStayFocusdPolicy.message: I allow StayFocusd to collect the data described in our $policyLink$.

activeHoursQueued.message:
Your active hours have been set. 

IMPORTANT: These changes will not go into effect until this time tomorrow (24 hours from now).

activeHoursSet.message: Your active hours have been set.

activeOption.description: Label text for popup when Nuclear Option is active

activeOverMidnight.description: When fully parsed, the message will read something like: 'StayFocusd will be active between 7:00 PM and midnight, and then between midnight at 6:00 AM. Are you sure that's what you meant to do?'
activeOverMidnight.message:
$extensionName$ will be active between $startTime$ and midnight, and then between midnight and $endTime$.

Are you sure that's what you meant to do?

activityMonitorOverlayBody.description: Displayed to user when they have been inactive for 5 minutes.
activityMonitorOverlayBody.message: You've been inactive for a while. We stopped your $extensionName$ countdown so you don't burn up all your time while you're away.

activityMonitorOverlayHeader.description: Displayed to user when they have been inactive for 5 minutes.

activityMonitorOverlayLink1.description: Segment of full string: 'Press any key or click here to continue.'

activityMonitorOverlayLink2.description: Segment of full string: 'Press any key or click here to continue.'

activityMonitorOverlayLink3.description: Segment of full string: 'Press any key or click here to continue.'

activityMonitorOverlayLink4.description: User clicks link to remove an overlay that has been blocking the web page from their view

addSiteToBlockedSitesList.message: Add $siteName$ to the Blocked Sites list

allSitesBlockedImmediately.message:
The time you entered is less than the amount of time you have remaining for today. That means all sites on your Blocked Sites list will be blocked immediately.

Are you sure you want to do this?

areYouSure.description: Are you sure you want to confirm these settings?
areYouSure.message: Are you sure you want to do this?

askBirthYearTitle.message: Quick question to help us know more about our userbase...

atTime.description: At a specific time, i.e. at 1:00 PM

birthYearErrorsLength.message: Enter all 4 digits of your birth year

blockAllowMultipleSites.message: Want to block or allow multiple sites at once?

blockNotification.description: For example, 'StayFocusd will start blocking your Blocked Sites in 10 minutes'
blockNotification.message: $extensionName$ will start blocking your Blocked Sites in

canOnlyImportExportedFile.message: You can only import a settings file previously exported from $extensionName$ via the Export Settings feature.

cannotAddAllowedSitesDuringNuclearOption.description: In this context, the 'Nuclear Option' is an idiom meaning 'the most extreme option'.
cannotAddAllowedSitesDuringNuclearOption.message: You cannot add sites to the Allowed Sites list while the Nuclear Option is active.

cannotAddSiteToRestrictionList.message: You cannot add site to list. You can disable sync in settings and after that add site again.

cannotAllowBlockedSiteOnceTimeIsUp.message: You cannot allow a previously blocked site once the maximum time for the day has been exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

cannotAllowSitesUsingWildcardsOnceTimeIs.message: You cannot allow any sites using wildcards once the maximum time for the day has been exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

cannotBlockStayFocusd.message: Sorry! You cannot add $domain$ to the Blocked Sites list.

cannotChangeTimeOnceTimeIsUp.message: You cannot change the Maximum Time Allowed once your time for the day has been exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

cannotChooseMoreLenientSetting.description: 'while it is active' = 'while the Nuclear Option is active'
cannotChooseMoreLenientSetting.message: You cannot choose a more lenient setting for the Nuclear Option while it is active.

cannotClearAllowedSitesDuringNuclearOpti.description: In this context, the 'Nuclear Option' is an idiom meaning 'the most extreme option'.
cannotClearAllowedSitesDuringNuclearOpti.message: You cannot clear the Allowed Sites list while the Nuclear Option is active.

cannotClearBlockedSitesOnceTimeIsUp.message: You cannot clear the Blocked Sites list once the maximum time for the day has been exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

cannotImportAfterTimeExpired.message: Your time for today has expired. You cannot import settings until after your Daily Reset Time has passed.

cannotImportDuringNuclearMode.message: Nuclear Option is currently active. You cannot import settings until Nuclear Option ends.

cannotRemoveBlockedSiteDuringNuclearOpti.description: In this context, the 'Nuclear Option' is an idiom meaning 'the most extreme option'.
cannotRemoveBlockedSiteDuringNuclearOpti.message: You cannot remove Blocked Sites while the Nuclear Option is active.

cannotRemoveBlockedSites.message: Your time for today has expired. You cannot remove Blocked Sites until after your Daily Reset Time has passed. (You can still add them though.)

cannotRemoveSiteOnceTimeIsUp.message: You cannot remove a site from the Blocked Sites list once the maximum time for the day has been exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

cannotSetMoreThan1440Mins.message: You cannot set the Maximum Time Allowed to more than 1,440 minutes (which is 24 hours).

cannotSetTimeToZero.message: You cannot set the Maximum Time Allowed to zero.

cannotSetTimeToZeroOrLess.message: You cannot set the Maximum Time Allowed to zero or less than zero.

challengeTextSet.message: Your challenge text has been set.

challengeTextTooShort.message: Sorry, your challenge text must be at least as long as the default challenge ($minChars$ characters)

commencingNuclearOption.description: This is meant to be humorous. The Nuclear Option is an extreme measure, so we're wishing them good luck in a humorous way.
commencingNuclearOption.message: Commencing Nuclear Option. May God have mercy on your soul.

completeChallengeBeforeIncreasingTime.message:
Whoa! Easy there, cowboy.

You haven't completed your challenge yet. You'll have to do that before you're allowed to increase your time.

Click OK to admit crushing, humiliating defeat.

confirmRequireChallenge.message: Are you sure you want to require a challenge?

currentlyOn.description: Indicates the domain the user is currently on, i.e. You are currently on cnn.com

customMsgSaved.message: Your custom redirect message has been saved.

dailyResetQueued.message:
Your daily reset time has been set. 

IMPORTANT: This change will not go into effect until this time tomorrow (24 hours from now).

dailyResetSet.message: Your daily reset time has been set.

deactivatedText.message: Click the button to enable it.

declineToSMessage.message: You must accept the Terms of Service to use StayFocusd.

defaultChallengeText.description: The user must re-type this paragraph perfectly, letter for letter, with no mistakes before being allowed to change settings. Therefore, every character in this text must be one that the user can type on his keyboard. Please translate with that in mind.
defaultChallengeText.message: The procrastinator is often remarkably optimistic about his ability to complete a task on a tight deadline; this is usually accompanied by expressions of reassurance that everything is under control. (Therefore, there is no need to start.) Lulled by a false sense of security, time passes. At some point, he crosses over an imaginary starting time and suddenly realizes, "Oh no! I am not in control! There isn't enough time!"

desktopPromoDescription.message: Monitor your desktop application usage and set usage limits to gain better control over them.

desktopPromoFooter.message: Visit $stayfreeWebsite$ (a partner of StayFocusd) to download desktop applications for Windows, Mac OS, or Linux.

desktopPromoTitle.message: StayFree Desktop App is now available!

disableExtension1.message:
Wait, what? You're not seriously thinking about disabling me, are you? 

Think of all the productivity we've achieved together. Click CANCEL to keep the magic alive.

disableExtension2.message:
Disabling me won't solve your problems. It's like ignoring a wise friend who only wants the best for you. 

Are you sure you want to go down this path?

disableExtension3.message:
This is getting serious. You're about to abandon your commitment to less procrastination. 

Do you really want to throw away all your progress for a moment of weakness?

disableExtension4.message: You clicked OK again? I'm starting to think you don't value our time together.

disableExtension5.message:
This is heartbreaking. The button you are about to press might also erase the happiest memories of your productive times. 

Can you live with that guilt?

disableExtension6.message: Still here? Still clicking? You're a tough cookie, but seriously, think about the puppies.

disableExtension7.message:
Last chance. After this, there's no turning back. Remember, every time someone disables me, a fairy loses its wings. 

Do you really want to be that person?

disableExtension8.message:
Alright, if you must. But know that somewhere, a unicorn sheds a single tear. 

Proceed with your decision, but remember: I warned you.

disableFinalWarning.message:
This is it. The final step. If you go through with this, you're on your own. 

But hey, if you ever change your mind, I'll be here... waiting... silently judging... but waiting.

englishCharsOnly.message: Please limit your text to English characters that only require one keypress per character.

error.description: An error occurred when blocking a site

errorLoadingSuggestedSites.message: Error loading suggested sites list. Please email $supportEmail$ and let me know if you get this error.

extensionDisabled.message: The extension is now disabled. Don't say I didn't warn you. The path to procrastination is wide open.

for.description: For example, 'StayFocusd will block images _for_ all websites'

forTime.description: For a period of time. For example, 'StayFocusd will block images _for_ 1 hour'

forms.description: Forms on a website, i.e. signup form

givingLessTime.description: The user has made his settings more strict, so we want to congratulate him.
givingLessTime.message:
You're giving yourself LESS time?

*slow clap*

Well played, my friend.

helpFAQ.description: Links to page with help and frequently asked questions (FAQ)

hideForever.description: Don't show info bar ever again

hideOnce.description: Don't show info bar right now

importEmailSupport.message: If that's what you did and you're still getting this error, please email $supportLink$ and attach the settings file you're trying to import.

inactive.description: Extension is not currently tracking time on blocked sites

infoBarBlockedByReferrer.description: A blocked site is a site the user has added to a list of time-wasting websites. Max Allowed Time is the maximum time they are allowed to spend on blocked sites.
infoBarBlockedByReferrer.message: You reached this page via a blocked site, so the time you spend here is being deducted from your Max Allowed Time.

initActiveHoursMsg.description: When fully parsed, the message will read something like: 'Starting on April 15, 2012 at 7:56 PM, your Active Hours will be from 12:00 AM to 11:58 PM'
initActiveHoursMsg.message: Starting on $msgDate$ at $msgTime$, your Active Hours will be from $startTime$ to $endTime$

initResetTimeMsg.description: When fully parsed, the message will read something like: 'Starting on April 15, 2012 at 7:56 PM, your Daily Reset Time will be 11:00 PM'
initResetTimeMsg.message: Starting on $msgDate$ at $msgTime$, your Daily Reset Time will be $resetTime$

joinDiscord.description: Link to join our Discord channel

lessThanThreeMins.message:
There are less than three minutes left before your time runs out. You're not trying to cheat, are you?

If you still want to update your settings, click OK.

lessThanThreeMins2.message:
Seriously, the whole point of this extension is that you're not supposed to give yourself extra time.

Are you sure you want to do this?

lessThanThreeMins3.message:
Look, this isn't working out. I can't help but feel like you're not committed to this relationship.

Are you really willing to risk our friendship just for a few more minutes of web browsing?

lessThanThreeMins4.message: I can't believe you clicked OK.

lessThanThreeMins5.message: This is why we can't have nice things.

lessThanThreeMins6.message: You're really going to go through with this, aren't you?

lessThanThreeMins8.message:
Okay, well ... I did my best. But before I change your settings, there's something you should know:

There's a slight chance that maybe, possibly, the OK button will start a global thermonuclear war.

Also, it may electrocute a puppy.

There are no guarantees, but it could happen. I just thought you should know.

Go ahead. Click away.

madeAMistake.description: This is shown when the user makes a mistake in a typing challenge that is meant to prevent them from cheating by changing their settings.
madeAMistake.message:
D'oh! You made a mistake.

Do you really need to change these settings, or are you just trying to cheat? Be honest.

Either way, you'll have to start over.

manifestBrowserActionDefaultTitle.description: Tooltip displayed when user hovers over extension icon. Tells them what they can do if they click the icon.

manifestDescription.message: Boost your productivity by limiting the amount of time you spend on time-wasting websites.

maxTimeHasBeenExceeded.description: Segment of string like, 'Your Max Time Allowed for today has already been exceeded, so the Nuclear Option will go into effect immediately.'
maxTimeHasBeenExceeded.message: Your Max Time Allowed for today has already been exceeded, so

maybeYouShouldReconsider.message:
You're trying to give yourself more time? You sure that's a good idea? Maybe you should reconsider.

Are you sure you want to increase the maximum time allowed?

meow.description: The user just clicked a button that warned him that clicking it would electrocute a kitten.

mustSelectSettingsFile.message: You must select a settings file to import. Click the Choose File to select a file.

noChartData.message: No data available. Try another date or change filters

noSitesYet.description: No sites are on the list yet

notEnoughVariation.description: This is shown when the user tries to set a custom typing challenge that is too easy, like a repeating sequence of the same character(s).
notEnoughVariation.message: Hmmm. Your challenge text has suspiciously little variation in characters. You'll have to use something more challenging.

notificationSettingsSaved.message: Your notification settings have been saved.

nuclearNotification.description: For example, 'StayFocusd's Nuclear Option will start blocking sites in 10 minutes'
nuclearNotification.message: $extensionName$ Nuclear Option will start blocking sites in

nuclearOption.description: Links to settings for Nuclear Option

nuclearOptionActiveUntil.description: Active until a certain time, i.e. active until 1:00 PM
nuclearOptionActiveUntil.message: The Nuclear Option is active until

nuclearOptionImmediately.description: In this context, the 'Nuclear Option' is an idiom meaning 'the most extreme option'.
nuclearOptionImmediately.message: the Nuclear Option will go into effect immediately.

numberOfKeysDoesNotMatch.description: This is shown when the user tries to cheat, bypassing a typing challenge by cutting-and-pasting text into it. Don't translate 'Pretty sneak, sis' -- it probably won't make sense in non-English contexts
numberOfKeysDoesNotMatch.message:
Uh oh. The number of keys you hit doesn't match the number of characters in the text box.

Some cut-and-paste trickery, perhaps? Pretty sneaky, sis.

You'll have to start over.

onActiveDays.message: on the days you selected in the Active Days tab

onboardingConfirmMessage.message: If you do not accept the Privacy Policy, some upcoming features will not be available.

onboardingConfirmTitle.message: Get the most out of StayFocusd

onboardingExistingUserMessage.message: StayFocusd is now a part of the $sensorTowerLink$ family. Look forward to some new features over the coming months:

onboardingNewUserMessage.message: StayFocusd is the best tool for staying productive. Accept our Terms of Service to get started.

onlyAllowPagesOn.description: For example, 'Only allow pages on cnn.com'

onlyBlockPagesOn.description: For example, 'Only block pages on cnn.com'

onlyHurtingYourself.message:
Seriously, dude. The whole point of this extension is to stop you from procrastinating.

You're only hurting yourself.

And the kitten that gets an electric shock every time you click OK.

Are you sure you can live with yourself?

privatePolicyProps1.message: We do not want to know who you are

privatePolicyProps2.message: We de-identify any information we collect

privatePolicyProps3.message: We never sell any collected information to third parties

privatePolicyProps4.message: We purposefully avoid and never intentionally handle sensitive data

privatePolicyProps5.message: We use anonymized information to further develop StayFocusd and Sensor Tower products and services

problemImportingSettings.message: There was a problem importing your settings.

refreshToSeeImportedSettings.message: You may have to restart Chrome before all your imported settings are activated.

removeSiteFromAllowedSitesList.message: Remove $siteName$ from the Allowed Sites list

removeSiteFromBlockedSitesList.message: Remove $siteName$ from the Blocked Sites list

selectedTimeHasPassed.description: Segment of string like, 'Your selected time has already passed, so the Nuclear Option will go into effect immediately.'
selectedTimeHasPassed.message: Your selected time has already passed, so

startingTime.description: Starting at a time, i.e. 'Starting at 1:00 PM' or 'Starting right now'

stayFocusdWillBlock.description: Segment of full string: 'StayFocusd will block all sites' or 'StayFocusd will block multimedia and forms'

surveyAsk.message: Want to help us improve StayFocusd?

timeExpiredCannotChangeUntilTomorrow.message: Your time for today has expired. You cannot change these settings until tomorrow.

timeExpiredForGroup.message: $groupName$’s time limit has expired for today. You can’t apply any changes to this group until tomorrow. Blocked sites can't be removed but you can still add new blocked sites anytime you want.

timeRemaining.description: The amount of time left before the clock runs out.

tosHaveChanged.message: Our Terms of Service have changed. Open the settings page to accept them.

under18Message.message: StayFocusd can be used if you are under 18! Some features may not be available.

whenMaxTimeExceeded.description: When I have used my allotted time
whenMaxTimeExceeded.message: when my Max Time Allowed has been exceeded
